title: Smart Data Models - Accumulator
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Accumulator represents an accumulated (counted) Measurement, e.g. an energy value.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be Accumulator

AccumulatorValues.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Measurement to which this value is connected. Default: 'list'

LimitSets.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The Measurements using the LimitSet. Default: 'list'
